location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Gideon Colquhoun, Assistant in Charge of the Residency at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Assistant in Charge that the HC Cruizer Vestalhas arrived at Bushire giving convoy to the Lord Minto, which was conveying arms for the use of the King of Persia, Fatâ€²h Ali Shah Qajar. It further notes that the Vestalhas been dispatched to Bussora [Basra], so that it may convey any intelligence for the Bombay Government back to India.
